answers.answer: Causes for excessive eating include the following:1. pregnancy,2. Cushing's disease or other endocrine disorders, such as diabetes,3. pancreatic exocrine insufficiency (this disease causes weight loss despite excessive eating).4. gastrointestinal parasites.5. The use of steroids, such as prednisone.6. some cancer'sand many more.Please have your dog examined by a veterinarian for a definitive diagnosis.

question: My  German Shepherd ***** has suddenly started eating a lot more food for her evening meal, she is always looking for more food, even though we give here loads.
title: why has my dog suddenly started eating more food at night
